doc.title: Fred
doc.plot: These interstitial shorts follow Fred Armisen (as the eponymous "Fred") as he manages to wriggle his way into various conventions held in swanky NYC hotels in order to ask inane/absurd questions of the keynote speakers, thrusts his microphone into the faces of unsuspecting passersby without saying a word, and essentially has his way with anyone he wants, while allowing us to witness the entire process.
